titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-Hydroxy-4-Methoxy Benzophenone Sulfonic Acid.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1997, the duty on 2-hydroxy-4-methoxy benzophenone sulfonic acid.
